Not a good idea to remove password.  Passwords afford security on a linux system, not having one is very bad.
If you go to:  System -> Administration -> Login Window  you can implement passwordless login.

Linux is more secure and stable than MS Windows when good passwords are used, but it is quite the opposite if passwords are not used.
